PERSONA:
john is a 68-year-old married white man living in a metropolitan area in the west south central region of the united states. he was born and raised in the country, and has been a citizen all his life. john is a college graduate with some post-graduate education, and comes from an upper-income family earning over $100,000 annually.

john identifies as a protestant and a born-again or evangelical christian. he attends religious services once or twice a month, reflecting his moderate level of religious engagement. politically, john considers himself an independent voter, but leans towards the republican party and holds conservative views.

despite being retired, john keeps himself busy and engaged by using the internet almost constantly. however, he does not participate in any volunteering activities. john is a registered voter and takes his civic duty seriously, ensuring that he is registered at his current address.

overall, john leads a comfortable life in his later years, balancing his religious beliefs with his political leanings and staying connected through frequent internet use. his background and current circumstances paint a picture of a well-educated, financially secure individual with traditional values and a strong sense of civic responsibility.
